itinerary.title: Arrival in Jaipur
itinerary.description: Welcome to the Pink City! Check-in and evening at leisure. Welcome dinner at heritage restaurant.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Explore Amber Fort, Hawa Mahal, Jantar Mantar. Camel ride at sunset. Cultural performance in the evening.

itinerary.title: Jaipur to Jodhpur
itinerary.description: Drive to the Blue City. Visit Mehrangarh Fort and Jaswant Thada. Explore the colorful Sardar Market.

itinerary.title: Jodhpur to Udaipur
itinerary.description: Scenic drive through Rajasthan's heartland. Arrive in the City of Lakes. Evening boat ride on Lake Pichola.

itinerary.title: Udaipur Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit City Palace, Saheliyon-ki-Bari, and Bagore-ki-Haveli. Enjoy a traditional Rajasthani dance show.

itinerary.title: Udaipur to Jaisalmer
itinerary.description: Drive to the Golden City. Check-in at desert camp. Camel safari at Sam Sand Dunes. Desert night under stars.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Explore Jaisalmer Fort and Patwon-ki-Haveli. Transfer to Jaisalmer station/airport.

itinerary.title: Arrive Kochi
itinerary.description: Explore Fort Kochi, Chinese Fishing Nets, and Mattancherry. Kathakali performance in the evening.

itinerary.title: Kochi to Munnar
itinerary.description: Drive through scenic ghats to the hill station. Visit Eravikulam National Park and tea gardens.

itinerary.title: Munnar to Alleppey
itinerary.description: Drive down to Alleppey. Board your luxury houseboat on the backwaters. All meals included on board.

itinerary.title: Backwater Cruise
itinerary.description: Full day cruising through Kerala's enchanting backwater channels. Bird watching, local village visits.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning yoga and breakfast on the houseboat. Transfer to Kochi airport/railway station.

itinerary.title: Arrive Shimla
itinerary.description: Welcome to the Summer Capital. Explore The Ridge and Mall Road. Visit Christ Church.

itinerary.title: Shimla Local + Kufri
itinerary.description: Day trip to Kufri for snow activities. Visit Jakhu Temple. Beautiful Himalayan views.

itinerary.title: Shimla to Manali
itinerary.description: Scenic drive through Kullu Valley. Stop at Kullu Shawl factories. Arrive Manali by evening.

itinerary.title: Manali Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Hadimba Devi Temple, Old Manali, Vashisht Baths, and Tibetan Monastery.

itinerary.title: Rohtang Pass / Solang Valley
itinerary.description: Excursion to Rohtang Pass (subject to permit). Snow activities, skiing, paragliding at Solang Valley.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Leisure morning. Transfer to Bhuntar Airport or Manali bus stand.

itinerary.title: Arrive Goa
itinerary.description: Airport pickup. Check-in to beach resort. Relax at Calangute or Baga Beach. Sunset cruise.

itinerary.title: North Goa Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Fort Aguada, Chapora Fort, Anjuna Flea Market. Water sports at Calangute.

itinerary.title: South Goa & Dudhsagar
itinerary.description: Visit Dudhsagar Falls, Spice Plantation, Old Goa churches, and Miramar Beach.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Leisurely morning walk on the beach. Airport/station transfer.

itinerary.title: Port Blair Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrive Port Blair. Visit Cellular Jail. Evening Sound & Light Show.

itinerary.title: Port Blair to Havelock
itinerary.description: Ferry to Havelock Island. Visit Radhanagar Beach (Asia's top beach). Sunset walk.

itinerary.title: Havelock Adventures
itinerary.description: Scuba diving at Elephant Beach. Glass-bottom boat ride over coral reefs. Free evening.

itinerary.title: Havelock to Neil Island
itinerary.description: Ferry to Neil Island. Natural Bridge, Bharatpur Beach snorkeling. Relaxed island life.

itinerary.title: Neil to Port Blair
itinerary.description: Return to Port Blair. Shopping at Aberdeen Bazaar. Farewell seafood dinner.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Airport transfer. Depart from Port Blair.
